lead_paragraph: RYAN--David Francis, beloved husband of Linda Thung-Ryan, died peacefully in his home, Croton on Hudson, NY on January 4th. He was 73. David was born in Yonkers, NY. He graduated from the College of the Holy Cross and the Columbia School of Law. For over 40 years, he practiced Antitrust and Intellectual Property Law, as a partner, at the renowned New York City firms: Kaye Scholar, Fierman, Hays & Handler and Fitzpatrick, Cella, Harper & Scinto. Throughout his life, David was a humanist with a love and encyclopedic knowledge of the arts. He was an avid sports enthusiast. David is survived by his wife Linda; his son David Ryan III (Mary Ryan) and his daughter Deirdre Ryan (Warren Costikyan); six grandchildren; and his siblings, Veronica Plavonich, Judith Ryan, Deborah Johnson, Paul Ryan, Mark Ryan, and Mary Ryan. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the College of the Holy Cross or The Metropolitan Opera. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  RYAN, DAVID FRANCIS
